1.eng-name: The Book of Purification and its Sunnah

hadiths.text: It was narrated that Abu Hurairah said:"The Messenger of Allah said: 'The deeds connected to the Fitrah are five (or five things are connected to the Fitrah): circumcision, shaving the pubic hairs, clipping the nails, plucking the armpit hairs and trimming the mustache
